title: LoL Nature Documentary: The Silver-Ranked Assassin Main
body:
{{champion:29}} Hello, friends! Today I invite you on a journey of discovery, for today we will be venturing out to observe the Silver-Ranked Assassin Main in its natural habitat.

{{champion:29}} Now as may not be aware, the Silver-Ranked Assassin Main might appear dangerous, but is actually quite harmless. Still, let's do our best not to disturb them, so we can observe their natural behavior!

{{champion:29}} Note the numerous posters on the outside of the subject's habitat. These seem to be some sort of indication that the subject's sire and dame should not enter the dwelling, and attempts to signal a particular fondness for the rhythmic screeching patterns known as "screamo music".

{{champion:29}} Quite strange! However, our journey doesn't stop here. Let's take a look inside!

{{champion:238}} Oh my fucking god, ganked again! This fucking jungler is no help! *typing noises* This is why I'm in elo hell! *munch munch* Fucking noob, doesn't he fucking see I'm carrying! They don't understand! Just like my parents don't understand me!! Mom, bring me some more doritos!!

{{champion:29}} Sneaky, sneaky! Better not make too much noise, or he'll notice us! Luckily, the scent of his own filthy laundry and unwashed body mask even my stench! Let's try and get a closer look at what he's signalling there...

{{champion:238}} "report khazix for ks!!! noob no help! Fucking nooblords at this elo, my Zed can 1v1 any of you!!"

{{champion:238}} I'm the fucking best! Faker should ask ME for lessons!! I'm only 1/9 because of my shit team never helping!

{{champion:29}} Yeesh! That's filthy enough to make a sewer rat blush! But let's see how he reacts when the dame shows up...

{{champion:238}} Mom!!! Mom!! Ugh, she never does ANYTHING for me!!!

{{champion:37}} Sweetie, I brought your Doritos. Can you and your friends hold it down a little bit? Grandma Sue is over, and she has a headache from her weekend in Vegas.

{{champion:238}} Oh my god, mom!!! I'm playing a competitive game! If I keep winning I'll be a pro gamer, I can't focus on containing my emotions! Why don't you understand me!!

{{champion:37}} Oh, you kids and your games *chuckles*. I'm getting Taco Bell for dinner, any requests?

{{champion:238}} ...Fine... bring me two chalupas... and a taco. With extra mild sauce.

{{champion:37}} *Rubs the Silverrank's hair* Sure thing. I'll let you know when we're back.

{{champion:238}} Whatever. OH MY GOD WOW THIS FUCKING JUNGLER STILL WON'T WARD OR GANK FOR ME GG REPORT UDYR.

{{champion:29}} Wards? Uh-oh... we'd better skidaddle before he decides to buy nothing but pink wards and spots us!

{{champion:29}} Well, there you have it! Truly, these are majestic creatures, more afraid of their team then they are of you! Let's not be too hard on them, shall we? They're only doing their best! ...Even if their best is Silver V. I'm out for now, but I'll be back with more exciting stories of the creatures of LoL!
